Content.Text:
<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Howdy, <MYNAME>! How's work going? Come
on in, take a load off for a few minutes.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! That reminds me, there's a favor I'd like to
ask you, if you don't mind.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
See, I've got a busted desk in one of the guest
rooms. I'd like to fix it, but I just don't have the
materials on hand.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Could I trouble you to go collect some materials
for me?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You will? Great! You're a real lifesaver.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd do it myself, but I can't leave the inn
unstaffed. Because of that, I kind of depend on
others for errands like this.
<PAGE>
I shouldn't need too much. About <BLUE>5 twigs</BLUE>
should do it. There ought to be plenty lying
around the forest paths.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks again!
Let's go find some twigs!
That's <MOJI0> twigs found!
I haven't found enough twigs yet.

Should I give up on helping for now and go
back to the inn?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
Keep going.
Stop and go back.
All right, 5 twigs! That should be enough.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey there, welcome back. Thanks for helping me
out. I'll take those twigs off your hands.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...it looks like you're a little short of the
amount I needed, but oh well. I'll make do
somehow. Thanks again!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Great! These should be plenty. Thanks again,
<MYNAME>! You really helped me out there.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey! As a little thank-you, how about I make
you something? I'm something of an amateur
carpenter myself, you know?
Wooden Bench
Eastern Table
Wooden Swing

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay! I'll start work on it the next time I have
some time to spare. It'll be great, I promise!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I should get back to work. You've got
to be tired from all your foraging too. Why don't
you take a little break?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it?
